text: Sano kwa achina Samuda (twantumisye) nnongo n’jao (jwali) Swaleh. Jwalakwe jwatite: “E wandu wangu! Mun’galagatilani Allah, nganinkola wanganyammwe nnungu jwine jwangawaga Jwalakwe, Jwalakwe ni juwan’gumbile jenumanja kuumila mwitaka, ni kuntamika palakwepo, basi mum’bendagani chikululuko kaneko ni kutenda toba Kukwakwe, chisimu Ambuje wangu ali pakuwandika (ni umanyilisi Wakwe), Wakwanga (maduwa)
